directions: Saute garlic and onion in olive oil over medium heat;  add mushrooms as the aroma develops. Add chicken stock and wine, and cook until mixture is reduced to 1/2 volume. Blend in cream, and  reduce to desired thickness.  Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Meanwhile cook pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente.
Drain pasta, and toss with sauce until coated.  Serve on small warmed plates, topped with grated Parmesan cheese and parsley.
title: Shiitake Angel Hair Pasta
